articles.title: Liverpool beat Brexit deadline to sign teenage Celta Vigo defender Stefan Bajcetic - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool had to push through a move quickly with transfer rules set to change once the United Kingdom leaves the European Union on January 1
articles.content:
Liverpool have completed the signing of teenage Celta Vigo defender Stefan Bajcetic.
